body_html:
@brunoalr Are you talking about this:

  1. Use of orphaned construct outside parallel region: When using a combined
    worksharing construct, sometimes our students would forget to put down the
    parallel, producing an orphaned construct. In other cases, the parallel region
    was forgotten altogether, leading e. g. to orphaned critical constructs.
body_text:
@brunoalr Are you talking about this:


Use of orphaned construct outside parallel region: When using a combined
worksharing construct, sometimes our students would forget to put down the
parallel, producing an orphaned construct. In other cases, the parallel region
was forgotten altogether, leading e. g. to orphaned critical constructs.
body:
@brunoalr Are you talking about this:

> 3. Use of orphaned construct outside parallel region: When using a combined
worksharing construct, sometimes our students would forget to put down the
parallel, producing an orphaned construct. In other cases, the parallel region
was forgotten altogether, leading e. g. to orphaned critical constructs.
